snippet: A higher minimum wage? It’s a tax on business alone, an economist says.
abstract: N Gregory Mankiw Economic View column assays ways to help workers with limited skills who are struggling at the bottom of the economic ladder; contends higher minimum wage is a tax on business alone; favors plan to subsidize incomes of low-wage workers by increasing taxes on middle- and upper-income Americans.
lead_paragraph: A higher minimum wage? It’s a tax on business alone, an economist says.

headline.print_headline: Help the Working Poor, but Share the Burden
headline.main: Help the Working Poor, but Share the Burden
